Painful Reminder.name: Painful Reminder
Painful Reminder.flavor: You thump your adversary one more time, in case he forgot youâ€™re top dog.
Painful Reminder.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Painful Reminder.target: One creature you hit on your previous turn
Painful Reminder.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

Implied Threat.name: Implied Threat
Implied Threat.flavor: Even when you manage to be polite, you have a threatening air.
Implied Threat.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a power bonus to Intimidate checks equal to your Strength modifier.

Callous Strike.name: Callous Strike
Callous Strike.flavor: The cruelty of your attack causes other foes to withdraw from you.
Callous Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Callous Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Make a secondary attack, which has the fear keyword.
Callous Strike.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 1 square of you
Callous Strike.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target moves 1 square away from you.
Callous Strike.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and no secondary attack.
